Ukubhaliswa Kwabenzi Beepleyiti Zeenombolo-mbhalo Zezithuthi

AMAPHULO



IINDABA

IIKOMITI

AMAQUMRHU KAHULUMENTE



IZIXHOBO



UQHAGAMSHELWANO






INKCAZELO:

Nokomethetho oyiNational Road Traffic Act, nawuphi na umntu ovelisa okanye othengisa iipleyiti zeenombolo-mbhalo zezithuthi kufuneka abe ubhalisiwe.


IMIYALELO:

Ufaka isicelo malunga nokubhalisela ilayisenisi kumenzi weenombolo-mbhalo, uzalise ifomu engu-MNP uze uyithumele kwiCandelo loMthetho woLawulo kwiSebe leZothutho neMisebenzi Yoluntu. Kufuneka isicelo sakho sihambe:
* nesazisi sakho
* imali engummiselo ehlawulwayo.
Ukufumana ezinye iinkcukacha qhagamshelana
noCoretha Matthee
Inombolo Yomnxeba: 021 483 2076
cmatthee@pgwc.gov.za

IBONELELWA LISEBE:



ICANDELO LIKARHULUMENTE:

ULwenziwo lweeNdlela (Ezothutho Nemisebenzi Yoluntu, uRhulumente Wephondo leNtshona Kapa)


IXABISO:

Ngama-R300 imali yokwenza isicelo
